lines.text: Will you kill the baby, or what?
[listening to the loud beeping as her and raja are secretley hugging behind the sofa]
dont worry, its probabily an ambulance!
[looks up at the ceiling and see's Shalu's father staring at them angrily]
Shalu why is your father on the ceiling?
Raja... get up... come on get up!
[They move away from each other so they are not touching, the loud siren stops]
how come the beeping has stopped?
I'll tell you why! i knew how much of an cheat you are so i fitted my daughter with a transmitter.

[shocked]
Daddy there is a current running through my body?
yeah... so if someone touches her, then i would instantly know!
Get it our quickly or our kids will be born in the shape of tube lighters and light bulbs!
[he touches shalu and the beeper goes off]
